Bodyguard's Link.name: Bodyguard's Link
Bodyguard's Link.flavor: Your dragon mark sends a magic charge into your enemy when you hit, creating a link that lets you divert the foe’s attacks.
Bodyguard's Link.onHit: 3[W] + Strength or Intelligence modifier damage, and the next time the target hits an ally with a melee attack before the end of your next turn, you can choose to have the attack instead hit you.

Globe of Warding.name: Globe of Warding
Globe of Warding.flavor: You create a shimmering globe that strengthens allies against attacks.
Globe of Warding.effect: The burst creates a zone of protective energy that lasts until the end of your next turn. You and each ally within the zone gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against ranged and area attacks.

Punish the Assailant.name: Punish the Assailant
Punish the Assailant.flavor: Your weapon leaps into a gap in the defenses of an attacking enemy, punishing it for having the temerity to attack an ally.
Punish the Assailant.trigger: An enemy within your reach makes a melee attack roll against an ally
Punish the Assailant.onHit: 4[W] + Strength or Intelligence modifier damage, and the triggering enemy’s attack targets you instead of the ally, even if you are not within the attack’s range. If the attack misses you, you can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.
